title: [BONUS] Ep. 232 Intentional Advantage Podcast with Host Tanya Dalton on How to Set the Right Goals
itunes:title: [BONUS] Ep. 232 Intentional Advantage Podcast with Host Tanya Dalton on How to Set the Right Goals
description:
The biggest mistake people make with their goals is that they don’t set the right goals. Let me phrase that: They don’t set the right goals for themselves. There’s no magic list of goals you need to complete in order to be successful. 

Goals should be personalized and customized so they are in alignment with your purpose. In today’s episode, we’ll talk about how you discover your purpose and how to set goals that are aligned with the vision you have for your future. It’s time to stop living life on repeat and step into the extraordinary life you were designed to live.

In This Episode, You’ll Learn:

  • Why The Extraordinary Life is possible for you.
  • What goals should I be setting?
  • The biggest secret about setting goals to save you from burnout.
  • Why we need to stop trying harder.
  • Why you are already “wired” for success.
  • How you make big goals feel easier.
  • How Cathedral Thinking helps you discover your goals.
  • Taking off your backpack.
  • How you can break down your big vision into goals using wayfinding.
 

Connect with Tanya:

If you are interested in doing a one-on-one VIP Day with Tanya, go to TanyaDalton.com/VIP

Sign up for Tanya’s VIP Email List to get behind the scenes access to podcast extras, free challenges and events along with bonus tips.

 

Sponsor:
